description: Dashboard showing Prometheus Alertmanager metrics for observing status of the cluster and possible debbuging.

links.title: Twitter
links.tooltip: Twitter account with prometheus related info

panels.title: Notification Send Latency Group by Quantile

panels.title: Alerts Count Group by State

panels.description: 当前集群过去5分钟内从Prometheus接收到告警消息，按照触发的告警的状态进行分组
panels.title: Received Aerts Count from Prometheus Group by Status

panels.description: 当前集群当中排队的消息和处理的消息

panels.title: Request Count of Alert Manager

panels.description: 当前集群的健康分数
panels.title: Cluster Health Score

panels.description: 当前集群的成员数和失败的节点数
panels.title: Cluster Members Count

panels.description: 当前集群过去5分钟内加入的节点和丢失的节点
panels.title: Cluster Peers Left and Joined

panels.title: Cluster Reconnections

panels.description: Prometheus实例的goroutines数量
panels.title: Goroutines Group by Instance
